[{"id":"dev-17096","entityId":"86-22414","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Booking amendment] Incorrect currency for new total"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Andrii Bugaichuk"},{"name":"created","value":"1577091460218"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17096"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo-test-de.de/resellers/account/bookings
Account emailgasser@jumpark.ch
Supplier ID12976

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Login to resellers dashboard, go to list of booking
  2. Click on any not canceled booking with CHF currency (https://www.regiondo-test-de.de/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/1-5944813-32393-50665-1571853600)
  3. Click on "Buchung andern" tab

Actual result:

New total is displayed in Euro

Expected result:

New total is displayed in the same currency as original total

New total is displayed properly in supplier currency when altering booking.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1580140240862,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login

URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/2-196117-25849-1541172600/

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Get a customer phone call that booked an activity (e.g. Werktour)
  2. The customer wants to join the tour tomorrow instead of today
  3. The Werktour tomorrow is fully booked
  4. You propose an alternative tour to the customer (Turmfahrt)
  5. He accepts the alternative

Actual result:

A user can only propose an alternative appointment date and time for the original product that has been booked
In order to propose an alternative activity, you have to cancel the booking and place a new booking

Expected result:

User should be able to propose an alternative activity without having to cancel the booking and re-entering the customer data

UI if no other activity is selected:

UI if another activity is selected:

Clickdummy:
https://marvelapp.com/1cji4g0g/screen/53191469

Loading State

Please keep the same logic as in our POS

Copy

EN

Old
New

Offer
Price for
Appointment
Price category

Previous total
New total

Acceptance Criteria

  • After altering booking check :
  • Calendar
  • Attendee list
  • Customer database
  • booking overview
  • Email sent to customer
  • Ticket
  • API : list of sold item , get purchase update , list of booking
  • Webhooks :

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1574360793898,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64335","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei : tested on testing with demoaccount@regiondo.de
1-Booking number 1575993741001824400 : altered booing from product ballade to cocktails
A- Changed one ticket option to another one


  • Same Ticket with same barcode : works

  • Sales receipt is not re-generated

  • Price of the booking Remain the same

  • Statistic Export : changes taken into account

  • Calendar > Attendee list : changes are taken into account

  • Booking > Attendee list : Changes are taken into account

  • Booking confirmation email

  • Scan Code

  • Webhooks :; works correctly

  • Customer database

B- Booking contain 2 or more different ticket option tested with booking number 1575995591058205300

  • Could not able to proceed with 0 ticket : correct

  • Same ticket code are used : Works

  • Dashboard > Calendar > Attendee list : works

dashboard > Booking > Attendee list : Works

  • Webhooks : 3 events created for each ticket : works

  • Price of the booking Remain the same

  • No sales receipt regenerated

  • Customer database

  • Booking confirmation email : works

C- Cancel ticket + altering
tested with booking number 1575986268072172800 - Booking contain 2 tickets

  • Cancelled one ticket then altered the other one

  • New ticket generated containing the same barcode : works

D- Checked with bundle : booking number 1575998521037408200

  • Altered only one ticket : works

  • Booking confirmation email : works

  • Dashboard > Calendar > attendee list : Works

  • Dashboard > booking > Attendee list : works

  • Statistic Export : Works

E- Tried to Alter addons Booking : Not possible : correct behaviour

F- tried to Alter Value voucher : Not possible : correct behaviour

J: Tried to Alter Gift certificate : Booking number 1575999350021877400 : Supplier should not be able to alter a gift certificate, please add this restriction

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575997121435,"updated":1575999735025,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64418","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576148180616,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64446","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei
1- redeemed gift certificate : works properly tested with booking number 1575014886084549600 (Only date and time can be changed )
2- Statistic export not updated after altering product from product A to B
3- Price displayed in Booking overview is misleading as we take the new amount of ticket and we calculate the new price based on the price of the old offer
Before altering

After aletring

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576158724857,"updated":1576159220790,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64454","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei

  • Issues with statistic still persist
  • System propose you now to overbook for no reason
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576168827420,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64505","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri, @Naomi,

  1. Issue with statistics is resolved now, and most probably was caused by the full reindex running in background, causing delays in statistics re-indexing.
  2. Issue with calendar and improper behavior of date and time picker is fixed.

Please, re-test.

Test steps:
1. Statistics:

  1. Go to resellers dashboard.
  2. Open any normal booking (not redeemed, not voucher).
  3. Go to Statistics Export: https://www.regiondo-test-uk.de/resellers/account/statisticsexport
  4. Filter by the open booking key. Check that corresponding records are present.
  5. Alter the open booking to a different product/variation/date/time/qty.
  6. Reload the statistics and ensure that records are updated: they should contain new product name, variation/option name, dates. The number of records should correspond the new Qty.

2. Date/Time picker

  1. Go to resellers dashboard.
  2. Open any normal booking, with appointment date in next months (not current month). Example: Booking Number #1576155232012912900
  3. Select any other date without changing the month.
  4. Make sure that there are suggested times and options for the selected date.
  5. Change the product to a different one.
  6. Select any other date without changing the month.
  7. Make sure that there are suggested times and options for the selected date.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576496612309,"updated":1576498758163,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64603","author":"Naomi","authorFullName":"Naomi","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Please keep old functionality for Alter booking when it comes to partners.

Currently, partners can see the new design but they are limited when they want to change the offer -> they can alter using only the original offer used for the initial booking and can change only the price list, quantity, date and time frame of the same offer. (see attached video)

@Alexander Bechte Please decide if we want the old or the new functionality for partners included within this task or later after we analyze the impact of this change for partners.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576674581835,"updated":1576678743641,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64609","author":"alexander.bechte","authorFullName":"Alexander Bechte","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Hi Naomi, Maksym Hopei

as discussed we will implement it for Supplier/Operator Dashboard and hide it from Partner Dashboard in this task.

So in Partner dashboard there won't be any change regarding alter bookings.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576679662067,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64640","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576752524528,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64642","author":"Naomi","authorFullName":"Naomi","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei Checked booking alteration for partners -> old design available again.
Thank you.
Will continue with supplier testing after vacation.
Merry Christmas!

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576755093857,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64970","author":"Naomi","authorFullName":"Naomi","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on test with demoaccount@regiondo.de
Statistics are updated accordingly.
Date/Time picker is working as expected.

For gift certificates, only the date and time can be changed during alter booking.
For offers with euro currency/foreign currency, value vouchers redeemed and bundles bookings the product can be changed.

Booking id 1578921154037505200 with gift cert redeemed and was able to alter only date and time using the old design.
Booking id 1578926931005469800 with value voucher redeemed - able to alter product -> after changing the product the amounts from the booking view are not updated accordingly (total, total paid, the amount from number of tickets)


Amount not updated in Stripe and Magento from 15 into 14.

Booking id 1578928091079447600 for bundle - able to alter by changing the product
If the price is too high (bigger than 1.000) the new total will be incorrect: 1 if the number of tickets is 1, 2 if the number of tickets is 2 etc.

Booking id 1578927469017242900 for normal offer using coupon code -> changed offer from 'candle light dinner' into '1st 5 EUR offer' 5 February 8:30 and the calendar is not updated: date from 15.01.2020 20:30 should no longer appear in calendar for candle light dinner

Booking id 1578928171048143800 for normal offer 'Cours de cuisine végétarienne' when altering booking the new offer name is automatically in English although the original booking was in french: should display original title by default for new offer (Cours de cuisine végétarienne instead of
Vegetarian Cooking Course)

@Yann Maurer @Alexander Bechte @Walid Dechri
Q1. Should I be able to change into a product that has a different language? (currently, it is possible)

Q2. Should it work the same way for bundles? (currently, it works the same way)
If yes, should the customer be able to select any kind of offer or should be restricted only to bundles?

Q3. When we take into consideration Previous total should we look at the total paid or total without vouchers/coupon codes applied? Ex: order id 1578926931005469800

Q4. Should be able to overbook through alter booking when changing product? (currently, it is possible)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1578997796868,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64999","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Naomi, currently the booking prices/totals are not changed after alteration.
The new option price and the "New total" are shown for information purposes. No additional charges or money returns are made ATM.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1579019166006,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65129","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-15605","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Naomi @Yann Maurer @Alexander Bechte

Q1. Should I be able to change into a product that has a different language? (currently, it is possible)

@Maksym Hopei : Please limit the change of product only to the same language (FR to FR, En to En ). Could you do it today ? like this we can include it in the next release ?
Regarding the flag for language selector, please create another subtask which we will implement it later.

Q2: Should it work the same way for bundles? (currently, it works the same way)

@Naomi I would say to keep it like this as the supplier is managing his products so he know what every bundle include

Q3 When we take into consideration Previous total, should we look at the total paid or total without vouchers/coupon codes applied? Ex: order id 1578926931005469800

@Naomi We need to consider only the total without vouchers/coupon codes applied because for normal booking with value voucher we apply this same logic. CHECK booking 1579598481038357400

Q4. Should be able to overbook through alter booking when changing product? (currently, it is possible)
@Naomi Yes, we can overbook as soon as we display the notification and the overbook fuction is activated in https://www.regiondo-test-de.de/reseller/posconfig/settingsPos

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1579598994823,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-16565","entityId":"86-20953","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Ticketshop] [Bundle offer] Availability for second offer not showing completely when period falls on a change of months"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Aline Morgenstern"},{"name":"created","value":"1564996188106"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"16565"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://themorningstarcompany.regiondo.com/xxx
Product ID85986
Account emailaline.morgenstern@regiondo.com
Supplier ID21511
novomind ticket62445
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 75.0.3770.142

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Login to dashboard with aline.morgenstern@regiondo.com

  2. Go to Manage offers > My offer bundles and click on "Bundle offer" (product ID 85986).

  3. Go to step 3 tickets and set the point "Activities should start taking place within" to e.g. 14 days.

  4. Save and publish offer and open it in ticketshop: https://themorningstarcompany.regiondo.com/xxx

  5. Choose a day and time for the first offer where less than 14 days are left until the end of the month, e.g. 26th August, 8 a.m.

Actual result:

For the second offer, only the days 26th to 31st of August are shown for selection, which is within 6 days of the date that has been selected for the first offer. The remaining 8 days that were set up as availability in the offer creation, do not show up --> The period of 14 days that was set in the offer creation is not fully shown due to switch of calendar months.

The same thing happens when minutes or hours is used in the offer creation process.

Offer Sternenregen in Sternstadt Availability

Offer STADIUM TOUR

Expected result:

Even when there is a change of months, the availability should be completely displayed as was set in offer creation.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1572517451668,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64168","author":"y.maurer","authorFullName":"Yann Maurer","issueId":"dev-16565","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575554964521,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64222","author":"Bogdan_Cumpanasu","authorFullName":"Bogdan Cumpanasu","issueId":"dev-16565","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on testing with demoaccount@regiondo.de

  1. Edited the bundle id 112465 (Book it and bond) and went to step 3 tickets, set the point "Activities should start taking place within" to 14 days and selected option stating that the 'Customer selects start time for each activity (customer only selects first activity start time per default)':

    Chose the first activity to be on the 26th of December 2019. For the 2nd product we have the availability set up for the 14 days even if it's prolonged for the next month too ✓

  2. Edited the same bundle and went to step 3 tickets, set the point "Activities should start taking place within" to 14 days and selected option stating that the 'Customer is free to choose the sequence of activities'

    I'm able to select which one will start first and the 14 days are added accordingly to the selection, regardless of which activity I select to start first, even if it's prolonged for the next month too ✓

  3. Edited the same bundle and only went to step 3 tickets to set the point "Activities should start taking place within" to 14 days

    The first added product in the bundle is displayed first and after selecting the date of participation for this one, for the 2nd one the date is the same as for the 1st one, or it's the closest in the future. Correct behavior ✓

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575643989714,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64230","author":"Dmitry_Shitikov","authorFullName":"Dmitry Shitikov","issueId":"dev-16565","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575647711271,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64339","author":"Bogdan_Cumpanasu","authorFullName":"Bogdan Cumpanasu","issueId":"dev-16565","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on staging with demoaccount@regiondo.de
Edited the bundle id 24303 (Same product - Friends pack) that has 3 products and went to 'step 3 tickets', set the point "Activities should start taking place within" to 14 days and selected option stating that the 'Customer selects start time for each activity (customer only selects first activity start time per default)':

Chose the first activity to be on the 26th of December 2019. For the 2nd product we have the availability set up for the 14 days even if it's prolonged for the next month too ✓

Issues

  1. Wording - the phrase 'Activities should start taking place within BUNDLE_PARAM_WITHIN_DAYS_START' should be 'Activities should start taking place within'
  2. Availability shown for the 3rd product isn't fully shown (it misses the part from the next month where we should have availability until the 8th of January 2020):
  • this is the availability for the 3rd product present in the bundle (id 23939 - 'English Offer')
  • this is the availability shown when selecting the 3rd product from the bundle where the availability is missing for the 3rd product, in January (for the 2nd one we have the right availability)
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1576052216990,"updated":1576052263786,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64482","author":"Dmitry_Shitikov","authorFullName":"Dmitry Shitikov","issueId":"dev-16565","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Bug happens in this condition app/code/local/Regiondo/Product/Model/Bundle/Pricelist.php:238
steps to reproduce

  1. Open product view page with three components bundle
  2. Choose for first and second components dates and times
  3. Switch to next month third component
    If choose for second component same month as for third component then exception not throws.
    So I think need to improove condition app/code/local/Regiondo/Product/Model/Bundle/Pricelist.php:238
    or move to outside of this loop and validate.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1579002856390,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65000","author":"Bogdan_Cumpanasu","authorFullName":"Bogdan Cumpanasu","issueId":"dev-16565","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on live with demoaccount@regiondo.de
Checked with bundle called 'Same product - Friends pack' (id 122867) - it has 4 products (all 4 have recurring appointments - 122862) - the days are shown accordingly (attached screencast called 'Recurring - all good) - It seems the functionality is working ✓

  1. Edited the same bundle id 122867 (Same product - Friends pack) that has 4 products and went to 'step 3 tickets', set the point "Activities should start taking place within" to 14 days and selected option stating that the 'Customer selects start time for each activity (customer only selects first activity start time per default)':

    Chose the first activity to be on the 26th of January 2020. For the 2nd product we have the availability set up for the 14 days even if it's prolonged for the next month too ✓

  2. Edited the same bundle id 122867 (Same product - Friends pack) that has 4 products and went to 'step 3 tickets', set the point "Activities should start taking place within" to 14 days and selected options stating that the 'Customer is free to choose the sequence of activities' and 'Customer selects start time for each activity (customer only selects first activity start time per default)':

    Correct functionality - able to interchange the products, while the availability is taken into account every time ✓ - attached screencast called 'Correct functionality'

@Aline Morgenstern - I checked also the bundle from account aline.morgenstern@regiondo.com and I found an issue with the product itself: when trying to edit the bundle, it says 'Some bundle components are not available anymore and were disconnected from the bundle. Probably their sale period ended or they have manual confirmation or were removed':

But the URL takes us to the bundle page and, indeed, we have the last day of the month not shown:

Can you please recheck and confirm if we have correct functionality? Thank you in advance :).

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1579074356029,"updated":1579074592423,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65120","author":"a.morgenstern","authorFullName":"Aline Morgenstern","issueId":"dev-16565","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei As discussed with Bogdan, please check if you can find the error for bundle 85986 "Bundle offer" in account aline.morgenstern@regiondo.com. It's still not working for that one case apparently, but we cannot find the error.
Issue with English offer before was that I only tested it in German, not in English. Testable in English now too :-).
If you have any questions, feel free to get back.
